        public PersistentBlockMetadataAPI(@NotNull
                                  org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin)
        Construct the PersistentBlockMetadataAPI
        Parameters:
        plugin - the plugin using this API. Registers keys, events, and timers with this plugin

      • PersistentBlockMetadataAPI

        public PersistentBlockMetadataAPI(@NotNull
                                  org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin,
                                  boolean attemptReconstruction,
                                  boolean preventSending)
        Construct the PersistentBlockMetadataAPI
        Parameters:
        plugin - the plugin using this API. Registers keys, events, and timers with this plugin
        attemptReconstruction - if cloud reconstruction (upon detected death) should be enabled
        preventSending - if the server should prevent sending the entity packet
